summary:
# GitHub Notifications Summary

## PrefectHQ/marvin
- **Run Tests workflow run failed for main branch**: The main branch had two failed test runs, indicating potential issues with the continuous integration (CI) pipeline.

## PrefectHQ/prefect
- **Pull Requests**:
  - Update @prefecthq/prefect-ui-library to version 3.11.7 ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15756)).
  - Remove `setuptools` and update `pip` pin in Docker build ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15759)).
  - Expose JIT server setting ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15446)).
  - Fix handling of Dask DataFrame and other Awaitables ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15687)).
  - Pass lowercase log level to uvicorn server ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15680)).
  - Add code coverage generation and upload for Python tests ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15690)).
- **Issues**:
  - Prefect 3.0.10 fails to serialize context when using task_fun.delay() ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15753)).
  - Import of module `__prefect_loader__` failed with `multiprocessing.Pool.apply_async` ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/9329)).
  - State Changing Issue in the UI for Prefect 3 ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15751)).
  - Behavioural Issues in Retry Logic for Failed Tasks ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15658)).
  - EcsTaskRunner issues ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/14345)).
  - Unable to serve Prefect UI behind reverse proxy ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/11472)).
  - Fails to deploy webserver in runner ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15707)).
- **Workflow Runs**:
  - Multiple failed workflow runs for `fix-worker-env-deep-merge`, `fix-map-typing`, `adam/oss-5758-remove-max-active-runs-and-catchup`, `thread-pool-max-worker-config`, and `clean-break-serve` branches, indicating CI issues.

## PrefectHQ/nebula
- **Release**: New release version 2024.1018.172141 ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/nebula/releases/180732755)).

## PrefectHQ/prefect-collection-registry
- **Pull Request**: Update metadata for collection releases ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect-collection-registry/pulls/426)).

## PrefectHQ/prefect-recipes
- **Pull Requests**:
  - Bump tj-actions/changed-files from 44 to 45 ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect-recipes/pulls/275)).
  - Bump JamesIves/github-pages-deploy-action from 4.6.1 to 4.6.8 ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect-recipes/pulls/276)).

## PrefectHQ/platform
- **Pull Request**: `nebula-2024.1017.211308` ([link](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/platform/pulls/7633)).

---

### Urgent/Important Matters
- The main branch of PrefectHQ/marvin and several branches of PrefectHQ/prefect have failed CI tests, which could impact deployments and need immediate attention.
- Various issues in PrefectHQ/prefect related to task serialization, UI, and deployment failures might require prompt investigation. 

The above summary highlights the key updates and issues from the recent GitHub notifications, providing a concise overview for quick assessment and action.
